title: Industry Roles
content:
Core ML Positions

  • ML Engineer: Building and deploying ML systems
  • Data Scientist: Extracting insights from data
  • Research Scientist: Advancing state-of-the-art methods
  • AI Product Manager: Guiding AI product development

Domain-Specific Roles

  • Computer Vision Engineer: Visual data processing
  • NLP Engineer: Text and language processing
  • AI Ethics Specialist: Ensuring responsible AI
  • ML Ops Engineer: Managing ML infrastructure

Career Development

Growth paths for practitioners who have mastered the concepts from CS229, HUJI book, and your paper collection.
